enWisdom: Many a scholar is killed by his knowledge
Many a person who claims to have knowledge is not a scholar
Many a scholar does not benefit [from his knowledge]
Sometimes the one who can see [also] loses his way

Wisdom: مَنْ زَادَ عِلْمُهُ عَلَى عَقْلِهِ كَانَ وَبَالًا عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: One who learns [or lacks] the depth of knowledge proceeds [or is repelled] from the ways of wisdom
